attributes.comment:
It is absolutely ridiculous to see an organization sit on their asses, not do
their job year after year and then decide to ask for more money. Look at your
trend: You introduced PERM with more charges and screwed up the 1-140 and 485
stage, you followed it by 140 premium processing with 1000 dollars more but not
allow people to apply for the final stage. This department is nothing but a
money sucking machine. To say the least, you should be ashamed of yourselves to
play with lives of individuals who travel from miles away.

Green Card is a mirage. The employers offer it as a dog bone and we end up
wagging our tail initially. Once we are in, we are stuck. No promotions, No wage
increase, no professional freedom.

The least you could do when you do not perform your job effectively is to not
hang someone else up. Please stop this looting.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Suren R.
